search_history.title: How OpenAI Built Sora 2 (2025): Training, Data, and Model ...
search_history.content: According to the OpenAI announcement (Sep 30, 2025), Sora 2 â€œintroduces capabilities that have been difficult for prior video models to achieveâ€”such as more accurate physics, sharper realism, synchronized audio, enhanced steerability, and an expanded stylistic range.â€ See the details in the official page: OpenAI â€” Sora 2 is here (2025). * Provenance signals: The System Card states that all assets carry C2PA metadata and downloaded videos include a visible moving watermark; OpenAI also runs internal detection tools to assess whether content was produced by their products. * Officially documented: physics realism, audio sync, controllability, visible watermark + C2PA, stricter protections for minors and likeness, iterative rollout, iOS/web access, Sora 2 Pro and API plans.

search_history.query: Sora 2 model technical specifications architecture training data parameters
search_history.title: Open-Sora 2.0 Explained: Architecture, Training, and Why It ...
search_history.content: But thereâ€™s a second approach, which instead takes a detour, simplifying the problem with a twoâ€‘step process: first, you train a model to generate a highâ€‘quality image from a text prompt, and then you use that model and the image generated as a conditioning signal to generate a video. To maintain video quality at this high resolution, Open-Sora uses a sophisticated classifier-free guidance strategy, where it separately adjusts how strongly text and image conditions influence the generation process. So, splitting the training process, starting from text-to-image strengths and existing approaches, transitioning into efficient motion modeling at lower resolution, and finally refining at high resolution, Open-Sora 2.0 achieves state-of-the-art video generation quality comparable to much more expensive models but at a fraction of the cost.

search_history.content: Sora 2.0 has broken the cost barrier for advanced AI video generation with just $200,000 in training costs. This piece explores Open-Sora 2.0â€™s impressive performance with its modest training budget, details its three-stage training pipeline, and shows how unlimited public access benefits developers, researchers and the broader AI community. This marks a breakthrough in making AI video generation technology available to everyone. Open-Sora 2.0 follows the â€œDeepseek momentâ€ in language models, where better training methods helped open-source systems match commercial performance at lower costs . Open-Sora 2.0 brings a fundamental change to creative possibilities by making advanced video generation technology available to more people . Open-Sora 2.0 is a game-changing breakthrough in AI video generation that has altered the map with its affordable approach.
